timeline.bodyText: Java package at the top,Change BZip2Util and SevenZUtil by the way, if you can

timeline.bodyText: You don't need to initialize such a large value, just keep the default value

replies.bodyText:
The default size is 32.  Is it too small?
Maybe I can change the ARRAY_SIZE  to 1024. Is it OK?
